author: SGT
title: Fyodor Lukyanov: 2024 could be the year when the West‚Äôs liberal elites lose control of the world order
text: from [RT](https://www.rt.com/news/589841-wests-liberal-elites-lose-control/): With elections across the world, a lot could be about to change and the position of the minority has never looked so perilous This year began with one fierce military confrontation of global significance and ends with two. And there is no guarantee that they will not continue until the end of 2024. The chain of conflicts, seemingly territorial but essentially existential (at least in the perception of those involved), may prove to be quite long. TRUTH LIVES on at [https://sgtreport.tv/](https://sgtreport.tv/) In the 20th century ‚Äì with its wars, revolutions, colonial possessions and national liberations ‚Äì the world was cut up bizarrely and illogically. The military-ideological confrontation of the second half of the century was gradually transformed into a global framework. With its help, all collisions should, in theory, have been resolved. But they were not. On the contrary, as soon as the foundations began to wobble, they recurred with renewed vigor. The current proliferation of conflicts is a symptom of the weakening of the modern international power structure. This was exercised in the form of a ‚Äúliberal world order‚Äù (more recently called a ‚Äúrules-based order‚Äù). The basis of it was the confidence of a group of countries in their righteousness and the truth of their ideology, gained through victory in the Cold War. Liberal democracy and the market economy defeated the Soviet regime and its planned economy. But soon democracy as the power of the majority, taking into account the opinion of the minority, was transformed into a liberal scheme in which the minority is given more moral and political rights than the majority. Case in point: in almost all G7 countries the ratings of ruling parties/coalitions are now extremely low, i.e. governments represent the interests of a smaller part of the population. Alternative forces that challenge the current government are labelled as populist. This term (which, incidentally, comes from the word populus ‚Äì ‚Äúpeople‚Äù) has become almost a swear word, and the mainstream is instructed to fight those who are tarred by this brush. The idea is that the current elites do not need to be changed.

title: Tr√™s pessoas da mesma fam√≠lia s√£o levadas ao hospital ap√≥s acidente entre carro e caminh√£o na BR-251 | Grande Minas | G1
text:

Segundo o Samu, o autom√≥vel da fam√≠lia, que seguia de Jequi√© (BA) para S√£o Paulo, bateu de frente com o outro ve√≠culo, que estava carregado de frutas. N√£o h√° informa√ß√µes sobre as causas do acidente, mas a chuva pode ter colaborado com a colis√£o.
Conforme o Samu, a mulher, de 38 anos, teve traumatismo cranioencef√°lico grave, fratura exposta na perna direita e fratura no bra√ßo direito. Ela precisou ser intubada pela equipe m√©dica ainda no local do acidente. Em seguida, foi transportada de helic√≥ptero para a Santa Casa de Montes Claros.
Os socorristas ainda atenderam o filho da mulher, de cinco anos, que teve traumatismo cranioencef√°lico leve e foi conduzido para a mesma unidade de sa√∫de de ambul√¢ncia. O pai da crian√ßa, de 39 anos, n√£o apresentava ferimentos aparentes, mas foi levado para a Santa Casa.

author: VNExplorer
title: Esta es la TRISTE raz√≥n por la que Yolanda Andrade sospecha que es v√≠ctima de brujer√≠a
text:
Desde hace meses, la salud de Yolanda Andrade se ha visto mermada a causa de un aneurisma cerebral que le fue detectado hace meses y que le ha ocasionado fuertes s√≠ntomas que la han llevado a ausentarse de las pantallas por periodos largos, raz√≥n por la que decidi√≥ hablar al respecto, sincerandose con la audiencia.
El pasado abril, la famosa tuvo que ser hospitalizada de emergencia debido a un intenso dolor de cabeza y otros s√≠ntomas alarmantes que le han impedido hacer su vida con normalidad, sin notar mucha mejor√≠a a pesar del tratamiento m√©dico que lleva, algo que la ha llevado a sospechar que podr√≠a ser v√≠ctima de brujer√≠a.
¬øQu√© es una aneurisma cerebral, condici√≥n que afecta a Yolanda Andrade? La famosa revel√≥, en principio que sufr√≠a de un aneurisma cerebral, una condici√≥n en la que se forma un punto d√©bil en una arteria del cerebro que se hincha y llena de sangre, ejerciendo presi√≥n sobre los nervios o el tejido cerebral, debido a ello se ha sometido a un doloroso tratamiento para recuperar su salud.
Al haber experimentado complicaciones de salud de forma repentina, la famosa ha comenzado a sospechar que su enfermedad, m√°s all√° de ser un tema f√≠sico, podr√≠a igualmente tratarse de brujer√≠a, es decir que alguien le realizar√° un ‚Äòtrabajo‚Äô para afectarla.
Yolanda Andrade cree que es v√≠ctima de brujer√≠a Durante una entrevista con el programa ‚ÄòPrimer Impacto‚Äô, la conductora mencion√≥ que, tras reflexionar sobre su situaci√≥n, no puede encontrar una explicaci√≥n l√≥gica para su repentino aneurisma y esto la ha hecho considerar la posibilidad de que alguien est√© buscando perjudicarla con un ‚Äòtrabajo‚Äô.
‚ÄúTuve unos episodios muy extra√±os porque me empezaron a decir: ‚ÄòT√∫ tienes un trabajo, una brujer√≠a‚Äô, un no s√© qu√©, un hechizo. F√≠jate que no fue as√≠ de que fui con el curandero para que me d√© el remedio de eso (‚Ä¶) ‚Äú(Me ayudaron) las misas, el creer en Dios, el no estar pensando en eso, mi fe, la Virgen de Guadalupe‚Ä¶ En serio, ¬øQu√© habr√© hecho yo para que alguien deseara mi muerte?‚Äù, fue lo que dijo la famosa.

author: Il Foglio
title: Reportage. √Ä Odessa, l‚ÄôUkraine a d√©j√† gagn√© la guerre
text:
Le boulevard Primorsky, √† Odessa, s‚Äôapparente √† un th√©√¢tre. Les habitants et les visiteurs viennent y prendre des photos l√† o√π des panneaux l‚Äôinterdisent mollement. Juste √† c√¥t√© se trouve le port, et c‚Äôest une chose passionnante que de le voir fonctionner, si bien qu‚Äôon ne peut s‚Äôemp√™cher de prendre des clich√©s.
Il faut dire que c‚Äôest fascinant, tous ces bras m√©caniques en mouvement, ces norias de camions, le glissement des navires marchands sur les eaux de la mer Noire, la mer de la guerre. Le spectacle se joue tous les jours : il suffit d‚Äô√™tre l√†, du matin t√¥t jusqu‚Äôau soir, en √©vitant les alertes a√©riennes, car c‚Äôest le seul moment o√π le port se fige, pour reprendre vie ensuite, fr√©n√©tiquement, et redevenir la plaque tournante de l‚Äô√©conomie ukrainienne.
Ici, √† Odessa, les √©tablissements touristiques, malmen√©s par la brise marine, ont souvent l‚Äôair plus inanim√©s qu‚Äôailleurs. Ils semblent n√©s immobiles, comme de belles endormies. C‚Äôest le port qui donne du mouvement. C‚Äôest le port qui nous dit que cette ville vit, comme s‚Äôil y avait un metteur en sc√®ne derri√®re ce c≈ìur battant. Il suffit de s‚Äôarr√™ter et de bien regarder. Tous les grondements sourds et les bruissements √©manant de ces machines en mouvement, de ces cargos en partance, de ces silos qu‚Äôon vidange, se mettent tout √† coup √† fredonner tous en ch≈ìur : ‚ÄúRusskij voennyi karabl‚Äô idi na chuj‚Äù .
‚ÄúMerde aux navires de guerre russes‚Äù a √©t√© le premier slogan de l‚Äôinvasion ; et il provenait de cette mer laborieuse et grouillante. Deux ans apr√®s le d√©but de la guerre totale, l‚ÄôUkraine a d√©truit un grand nombre de ces navires de guerre. ‚ÄúAvant, on pouvait les apercevoir d‚Äôici‚Äù, nous explique en montrant la mer Dmytro Barinov, directeur adjoint de l‚ÄôUspa, l‚Äôautorit√© qui supervise toutes les infrastructures portuaires d‚ÄôUkraine.
‚ÄúMaintenant, ils ne s‚Äôapprochent plus, ils savent qu‚Äôon peut les atteindre.‚Äù Les nouvelles r√®gles du jeu en mer Noire sont claires et nettes pour Kiev. Depuis que la Russie a d√©cid√© de ne plus respecter l‚Äôaccord sign√© avec les Nations unies et la Turquie permettant la libre circulation des navires c√©r√©aliers, l‚ÄôUkraine met tout en ≈ìuvre pour contrer les attaques russes contre ses infrastructures portuaires, pour cr√©er des routes s√ªres pour les navires qui y font escale et surtout pour convaincre les armateurs qu‚Äôil est encore possible de passer par la mer Noire. Aucun de ces trois points n‚Äô√©tait acquis d‚Äôavance.
‚ÄúLe port d‚ÄôOdessa exporte √† pleine capacit√©‚Äù ‚ÄúLa victoire maritime, c‚Äôest la grande victoire de l‚ÄôUkraine en 2023, m√™me si elle a √©t√© √©clips√©e par la situation √† terre, confie au Foglio Yaroslav Trofimov, journaliste du Wall Street Journal n√© en Ukraine et auteur d‚Äôun li

author: OSEN
title: Doosan Bears' An Jae-seok returns from military service with new physique - CHOSUNBIZ
text: Professional baseball player An Jae-seok (23) of Doosan Bears is set to return to the first team after completing his military service.An Jae-seok is a large infield prospect who joined Doosan as the first overall pick in the 2021 rookie draft. He has played a total of 222 games in the KBO League, with a batting average of .226 (113 hits in 499 at-bats), 6 home runs, 36 RBIs, 58 runs scored, and 7 stolen bases, recording an OPS of .603. Although he has yet to reach his full potential, there are still high expectations for him.An Jae-seok, who enlisted in the army as an active-duty soldier last January, was discharged from military service on the 7th.Doosan's acting manager Jo Sung-hwan noted in an interview on the 20th, ‚ÄúAn Jae-seok is expected to start playing games in the second team at the end of July. We need to see how he performs in the Futures League and assess his physical condition. I think we will need to see about 10 games.‚Äù He added, ‚ÄúIf all goes well, I believe he could come up to the first team around mid-August.‚ÄùAn Jae-seok has gained 15 kg during his military service and has built up his physique. Acting manager Jo Sung-hwan said, ‚ÄúAccording to the Futures League coaching staff, he has developed his body very well,‚Äù and added, ‚ÄúI am trying to elevate him by assessing the situation without being too greedy or overexerting him.‚ÄùActing manager Jo Sung-hwan, who indicated he would observe An Jae-seok in about 10 games in the Futures League, stated, ‚ÄúIt is not important for An Jae-seok to hit .300 or .400 in the Futures League. We will focus on whether he can play healthily, if he feels comfortable with the pitcher's throws, and how his defensive movements are. If he is healthy, he will be able to perform in the first team.‚Äù He also noted, ‚ÄúOf course, if his performance in the Futures League backs him up, he will come up with more confidence, which would be much better.‚ÄùDoosan has seen stability in its infield with young infielders like rookie Park Jun-soon, Lee Yoo-chan, and Oh Myung-jin performing well this year. Acting manager Jo Sung-hwan shared, ‚ÄúYang Seok-hwan and Kang Seung-ho are on my mind. I am constantly thinking about how to handle the first base position. Honestly, I was worried about the center line, but thanks to Lee Yoo-chan and Oh Myung-jin, we have quickly found stability. Now, I am more concerned about the first base position,‚Äù and said, ‚ÄúIf An Jae-seok shows great condition and is needed to be promoted quickly in the Futures League, I will consider him for first base. He used to be a very slim shortstop, but now he has a physique that is suitable for first base.‚ÄùActing manager Jo Sung-hwan acknowledged, ‚ÄúIt is true that An Jae-seok is suited for the shortstop position,‚Äù and added, ‚ÄúHe has many very good aspects. But we also need to utilize good players in any way we can. We need some traffic control,‚Äù while also saying, ‚ÄúIt is a happy concern. This is a concern we can have as much as we want,‚Äù and smiled.[OSEN]

author: Redacci√≥n Tecnolog√≠a
title: Los dos electrodom√©sticos que no debe conectar al mismo tiempo en una regleta el√©ctrica, porque provocar√≠an un incendio
text: En el hogar moderno, las regletas el√©ctricas se han convertido en una soluci√≥n pr√°ctica para ampliar el n√∫mero de enchufes disponibles, y conectar m√∫ltiples dispositivos a una misma fuente de energ√≠a. Sin embargo, el uso incorrecto de estas regletas puede tener consecuencias peligrosas, especialmente cuando se trata de electrodom√©sticos que demandan una alta potencia. Entre estos, la plancha y el aire acondicionado son dos aparatos que, si se conectan simult√°neamente a la misma regleta, pueden representar un riesgo significativo de sobrecarga y posible incendio. La plancha es un electrodom√©stico com√∫n en la mayor√≠a de los hogares. Dise√±ada para proporcionar calor a temperaturas elevadas, y suele requerir una potencia considerable, que puede variar entre 1.000 y 3.000 vatios, dependiendo del modelo. Este alto consumo de energ√≠a puede ejercer una presi√≥n considerable sobre los circuitos el√©ctricos, especialmente si se utiliza una regleta que no est√° dise√±ada para manejar tal carga.Por otro lado, el aire acondicionado, otro electrodom√©stico esencial en las casas, tambi√©n presenta una demanda de energ√≠a significativa. Los modelos m√°s peque√±os pueden requerir entre 1.500 y 2.000 vatios, mientras que los sistemas de aire acondicionado m√°s grandes y potentes pueden llegar a consumir m√°s de 4.000 vatios. Esta necesidad de energ√≠a se debe a la funci√≥n de enfriamiento y la operaci√≥n de sus componentes, como el compresor y el ventilador. Cuando se conectan ambos dispositivos, la plancha y el aire acondicionado, a una misma regleta, la suma de sus demandas de energ√≠a puede superar la capacidad de la regleta y del circuito el√©ctrico al que est√° conectado . Las regletas el√©ctricas suelen tener una capacidad limitada, que var√≠a de un modelo a otro, pero que com√∫nmente no excede los 2.500 vatios. Si la carga total conectada a la regleta supera esta capacidad, el resultado puede ser una sobrecarga del circuito.La sobrecarga el√©ctrica ocurre cuando se demanda m√°s energ√≠a de la que el sistema puede soportar, de manera segura. Esto puede causar un sobrecalentamiento de la regleta y de los cables, aumentando el riesgo de incendio. Adem√°s, el sobrecalentamiento puede da√±ar los electrodom√©sticos conectados, reduciendo su vida √∫til y potencialmente generando fallos el√©ctricos que podr√≠an tener consecuencias a√∫n m√°s graves. Para prevenir estos riesgos, es fundamental comprender la capacidad de las regletas y la demanda de energ√≠a de los electrodom√©sticos que se conectan a ellas. Es recomendable consultar las especificaciones de cada aparato y asegurarse de que la carga total no supere la capacidad m√°xima de la regleta. En el caso de la plancha y el aire acondicionado, lo m√°s seguro es evitar conectarlos a la misma regleta y, si es posible, usar enchufes independientes para cada uno.Adem√°s, los hogares con sistemas el√©ctricos m√°s antiguos o con instalaciones de baja calidad pueden ser m√°s vulnerables a estos problemas. En tales casos, es aconsejable realizar una inspecci√≥n el√©ctrica profesional para garantizar que el sistema pueda soportar la demanda de energ√≠a de todos los electrodom√©sticos y aparatos conectados.La conexi√≥n simult√°nea de electrodom√©sticos de alta potencia, como una plancha y un aire acondicionado, a una misma regleta puede presentar riesgos significativos de sobrecarga el√©ctrica y potencial incendio. Para garantizar la seguridad, es esencial conocer la capacidad de la regleta y las demandas energ√©ticas de cada aparato, as√≠ como considerar el uso de enchufes independientes para dispositivos de alta potencia. La precauci√≥n y el conocimiento adecuado son clave para evitar accidentes y asegurar un uso seguro y eficiente de los electrodom√©sticos en el hogar. *Este art√≠culo fue creado con ayuda de una inteligencia artificial que utiliza machine learning para producir texto similar al humano, y curado por un periodista especializado de Semana.

author: Ishola Michael
title: Gombe: Gov Inuwa hails Supreme Court judgement
text:
Gombe State Governor, Muhammadu Inuwa Yahaya on Friday, hailed the Supreme Court judgement which affirmed his re-election as Governor of State in the March 18, 2023 governorship election.
The Governor, while reacting to the verdict of the apex court on the case involving him and the candidate of the People‚Äôs Democratic Party (PDP), Muhammad Jibrin Barde, as well as that of African Democratic Congress ( ADC) and its candidate, Nafiu Bala, delivered by a five-member panel led by Justice Kudirat Kekere-Ekun, described the judgements as affirmation of the will of the people of Gombe as expressed through the ballot in the last election.
According to him, ‚ÄúLet me begin by expressing my gratitude to Allah ( SWT) for all the victories, from the polls through the Tribunal to the Supreme Court.
‚ÄúToday‚Äôs decision of the Supreme Court is not just a personal and party triumph, but also an affirmation of the will of the people of Gombe State who have queued up during the 2023 governorship poll to give us their mandate for additional four years.
‚ÄúWith all court cases resolved, our focus and energy will now be directed towards advancing the development of Gombe state. During our first term, we implemented projects, initiated programmes, and enacted policy reforms that significantly improved the lives of our citizens.
‚ÄúI assure the people of Gombe that we are committed to doing even more in our second term, and they can anticipate more democracy dividends.‚Äù
Inuwa further expressed gratitude to the people of Gombe State for their support and cooperation, maintaining that the longstanding synergy between his administration and the people of the state has significantly contributed to the successes that have been achieved in the last four and a half years of his government.
He said ‚ÄúLet me on behalf of myself, the deputy governor, members of my government and the entire APC family, express our gratitude to the people of Gombe State for their prayers, steadfast support, cooperation and solidarity.
‚ÄúThe synergy between my administration and the people since 2019 to date has contributed significantly to the achievements and positive outcomes witnessed in various sectors.‚Äù
While commending the Supreme Court Justices for their diligence and thoroughness in handling the case, the Governor also hailed his legal team for their efforts in defending the mandate of Gombe people from the tribunal to the apex court.
He equally appreciated the leadership and members of the ruling APC for their support throughout this journey.
The governor also extended an olive branch to members of the opposition especially those who pursued different cases at the courts.
He said ‚ÄúGombe is not owned by any individual or party. Regardless of any differences, it belongs to all of us. In the spirit of unity and progress, I urge all members of the opposition to join us in the challenging task of working for greater Gombe.
‚ÄúAs the legal battle concludes, there are no winners or losers; let us work together for the progress and prosperity of our dear state.‚Äù

 NIGERIAN TRIBUNE
